title: Unable to connect to a game, now I have low priority queue and loss of LP.
body:
So, I was playing a game on Twitch with my friend. Halfway through the game, I disconnect, but I can still talk to my friend on Discord, open web pages, listen to youtube music, etc.
I tried to reconnect to the game multiple times, restarting the client and even restarting my computer. I was unable to connect tot he game, now I have 5 low priority queue games, and I lost 18 lp. How do I fix this, this has never happened to me, I just want to get gold before the deadline, and now I have a something that isn't solo queue blocking me.

replies.body: I haven't seen any issues with our servers, so I'm curious if there was an ISP issue that impacted some players or a common network problem.  Even though you can access some services like Discord, your network can still struggle to reach other specific servers.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this by improving the health of your connection to us as well as re-routing you if necessary.
is it similar to this? [link to my recent issue that riots ignoring](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/4NfWgFod-500-ping-and-disconnect-issues)
